texto: Hi! My name is Alex and I'm eleven years old. Every day, I wake up at seven o'clock. First, I wash my face and brush my teeth. Then, I have breakfast: usually cereal with milk and an orange juice. I go to school at eight o'clock by bus. My favorite subjects are English and Science. I have lunch at the school canteen at one o'clock. After school, I do my homework and I play basketball with my friends. I go to bed at nine o'clock. I'm busy but happy!

texto: Today is Saturday and I'm at the zoo with my family. Look! The lions are sleeping under the trees. The monkeys are climbing and jumping because they are very energetic. Animals are amazing!

texto: Last summer, I went to a beautiful village in the mountains with my grandparents. We stayed in a small house. Every morning, we went for a walk in the forest. One day, we saw a deer near the river! I took many photos with my camera. In the afternoons, I helped my grandmother in the garden. We cooked delicious vegetable soup for dinner. I didn't watch TV because I preferred reading books. It was very relaxing.

texto: The Olympic Games are very important. Athletes from all over the world compete in different sports. Swimming is fast, but cycling is faster. However, running is the most popular sport in the Olympics. To be an athlete, you must practice every day and eat healthy food. I want to be a gold medalist in the future because I love sports and I am very competitive!

texto: London is a fantastic city. There are many famous places to visit. Big Ben is a very old clock tower. You can see the River Thames from the London Eye. It is a giant wheel! People in London travel by red buses or by the Tube (the underground). I want to visit the British Museum to see the Egyptian mummies. Don't forget your umbrella because it often rains in London!

texto: If you want to be healthy, you should eat a balanced diet. You should eat five portions of fruit and vegetables every day. They have many vitamins! You should drink a lot of water too. Milk and cheese are good for your bones because they have calcium. You shouldn't eat too many sweets or drink soda because they have a lot of sugar. Healthy food gives you energy to play and study!

texto: Our Solar System has eight planets. The Sun is at the center. It is a very big and hot star. Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun. Earth is the third planet and it is our home. Mars is called the 'Red Planet'. Jupiter is the biggest planet of all. Some planets have moons; the Earth has only one moon. Astronauts use spaceships to travel to space and learn about the universe.

texto: Christopher Columbus was a famous explorer. He was born in Italy but he worked for the Spanish Kings: Isabel and Fernando. In 1492, he sailed across the Atlantic Ocean with three ships: the Santa María, the Pinta and the Niña. He wanted to go to India, but he arrived in America. This was a very important event in history. Today, many people speak Spanish in America because of this journey.

texto: There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, autumn and winter. In spring, flowers grow and the weather is warm. In summer, it is very hot and children go to the beach. In autumn, the leaves fall from the trees and it is windy. In winter, it is very cold and sometimes it snows. My favorite season is summer because I don't have school and I can swim in the sea every day!
